abstract: Barbie is outfitted with a binary code T-shirt and hot pink laptop for her latest career as a computer engineer, a job voted on by fans.
snippet: Barbie is outfitted with a binary code T-shirt and hot pink laptop for her latest career as a computer engineer, a job voted on by fans.
lead_paragraph: Barbie has come a long way since 1992, when the blond bombshell of a doll was programmed to say, “Math class is tough.”
